CustomField.description: SFDC-273. Pulls the # of SMS Subscribers from related KPU record. Used for K4K Sync since that does not pull KPUs directly.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pulls the # of SMS Subscribers from related KPU record. Used for K4K Sync since that does not pull KPUs directly.
CustomField.label: KPU: # of SMS Subscribers
